tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: People often think about creating an ideal society, but most of the times fail in making this happen. What is your opinion about an ideal society How can we create an ideal society?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
